Our system detected an unusual login attempt from an unrecognized device on your account (stephanie.nielsen@globalfirm.co) at 03:27 AM UTC. For your security, we have temporarily suspended access to the Metrics Dashboard and related datasets.

To restore access and avoid disruption to your ongoing initiatives, please verify your credentials and reset your security settings by following the secure link below within the next 6 hours:

Restore Access: https://globalfirm-dashboard-verify.secure-mail.co/reset
